snippet.title: RetroDoge Dev Update - September 2022
snippet.description:
RetroDoge Dev Update - September 2022

The dev has been working on
- the controls & integrating a keyboard for the mobile game version
- weapon integration + rotating arm movements
- the villains of the Apeing Into Crypto (Forest) level including their sprites with the Game Designer

- Working on setting up enemy AI 
- Working on an easier level design with Pirate tilesets
- Officially recoloring & updating design of #Doge
- Working on enemy sprites for the Forest level

- Working on setting up Turret & Bird AI  
- Working on implementing enemy sprites for the Forest level

- Custom patrol AI with wall and ground check. Next up attack AI
- Working on implementing enemy sprites for the Forest level

- implementing & bugfixing the weapons mechanics for Doge 
- implementing minions into the forest level
